headline: Black Enterprise to Honor Game-Changing Leaders at 2025 XCEL Summit for Men in Orlando
summary: FedEx Returns as Host Sponsor of Nation’s Premier Celebration of Male ExcellenceORLANDO, Fla., Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Black Enterprise is proud to announce the distinguished recipients of the 2025 XCEL Awards, to be honored during a red-carpet celebration at the highly anticipated XCEL Summit for Men, Oct. 15–17, at the Hyatt Regency Grand Cypress in Orlando, Florida. headline: St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital Showcases Philanthropic Impact During 2025 FedEx St. Jude Championship Week
summary: MEMPHIS, Tenn., August 04, 2025--The 2025 FedEx St. Jude Championship begins this week as the PGA TOUR and FedEx bring 70 of the world’s best golfers to the 68th PGA TOUR stop in Memphis while showcasing the impact of these decades of philanthropic support. Since 1970, the Memphis PGA Tour stop has raised more than $80 million to benefit St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital® and children with cancer and other life-threatening diseases.

headline: Freightos Expands Board of Directors, Adding Rotem Hershko and Appointing Udo Lange as Chairman
summary: Freightos (NASDAQ: CRGO), the leading vendor-neutral global freight booking and payment platform, today announced that Udo Lange, who joined the board in 2019, was appointed Non-Executive Chairman and that Rotem Hershko joined as a Director, both effective July 28, 2025.
